data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pham, Hong-Thai, Schouten, Marieke, Yang, Jeng-Tze (2012): A new cicada species of the genus Purana Distant, 1905 (Hemiptera: Cicadidae), with a key to the Purana species from Vietnam. Zootaxa 3580: 83-88, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.283058
